body:
Hi!


I think it would be great to have that in Debian, so I've started a packaging
effort at svn.debian.org/svn/python-apps/packages/raddisplay/trunk (access via
svn:// or - if you have an account on alioth.debian.org - via ssh+svn://....).
Unfortunately I don't have much spare time, to I would appreciate if somebody
would like to maintain it - with a lot of help from me of course. That's also a
good start into Debian packaging practice :)

Cheers,

Bernd


--
Bernd Zeimetz                             Debian GNU/Linux Developer

subject: [Radiance-general] New version of RadDisplay
